replies.body: I don't even fricking know how to apply it's too confusing jeez make it simple
replies.body_tagged: I don't even fricking know how to apply it's too confusing jeez make it simple

replies.body:
To be honest its simple, all you gotta do is go to staff applications section and click new discussion
Then name the title (your username) - Staff Application.

Then you must copy and paste the format into the text box (or just copy and paste your answers from word/notepad into the text box if you did it like me)

Then you put pics if you have pics to give you proof

Then you click post discussion
replies.body_tagged:
To be honest its simple, all you gotta do is go to staff applications section and click new discussion
Then name the title (your username) - Staff Application.

Then you must copy and paste the format into the text box (or just copy and paste your answers from word/notepad into the text box if you did it like me)

Then you put pics if you have pics to give you proof

Then you click post discussion
